title: Resume Critique and Job Roles I should be targeting
selftext:
Need some advice regarding the kinds of roles I should be targeting since I am not entirely sure how my profile would be received since it is slightly non standard.(Targeting ML roles)

comments:
i hope you know that we can see all your personal details !! 

home address , phone number and email and linkedin ...
Thanks! Yes I was aware, I will remove the resume soon
